xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR:
I. We have prepared and disclosed the details of the cash flow statement under the indirect method as per Schedule III read together with Ind-AS 7. Further as the present XBRL format is different from format prescribed under above applicable laws, we have disclosed the relevant details in following heads without any bifurcation between current and non-current.
1. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets-Includes both current and non-current
2. Adjustments for other financial assets, current-Includes both current and non-current
3. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other current liabilities-Includes both current and non-current
4. Adjustments for provisions, current-Includes both current and non-current
5. Adjustments for other financial liabilities, current-Includes both current and non-current
6. Adjustments for other liabilities, current and non-current are included in adjustment for other financial liabilities-current.
7. Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents includes INR 3390 Mn on account of cash and cash equivalent acquired through business combination.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL:
1. Other non-current assets includes "Right-of-use assets" amounting to INR 4,441 Mn, "Tax assets(net)" amounting to INR 1,086 Mn and "Other non-current assets" amounting to INR 1,134 Mn.
2. Other non-current financial liabilities represents "Lease liabilities".
3. Other current financial liabilities includes "Lease liabilities" amounting to INR 890 Mn and "Other financial liabilities" amounting to INR 470 Mn.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. In compliance with Ind AS 108 "Operating Segments" (refer Para 23), preparation and disclosure of segment assets and segment liabilities is not required. Hence in the xbrl utility we have mentioned 0 under each reportable segment for assets and liabilities.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillNotB: Re-measurement gain/ (loss) on defined benefit plans
Changes in fair value of equity and preference instruments carried at FVTOCI
Re-measurement gain/ (loss) on defined benefit plans
Changes in fair value of equity and preference instruments carried at FVTOCI

Exchange differences on translation of foreign operations
